news.text: We released a new update! v.2.1. Fixed bugs and added new features. Now you can add sales scripts from ready-made templates, edit them, and save time on data entry.

text.item: The calendar feature is now free for everyone.
Try our new free trial version.
Choose a lifetime, monthly, or annual plan.
Purchases made before March 2025 will be upgraded to a lifetime plan.
